description:
Silver Birch, T7 of LBI TPO (NO.333) 2007 (T1 in plan supplied)  - No works
Honey Locust, T5  of LBI TPO (NO.333) 2007 (T4  in plan supplied) - 5% crown thin
Magnolia - Lift by the removal of x1 lower branch
Robinia Pseudoacacia, T4  of LBI TPO (NO.333) 2007 (T2  in plan supplied) - Remove deadwood
Lime, T14 of LBI TPO (NO.333) 2007 (T5  in plan supplied) - Reduce to the last previous points of reduction
Lime, T13 of LBI TPO (NO.333) 2007 (T6  in plan supplied) - Reduce to the last previous points of reduction
Lime, T12 of LBI TPO (NO.333) 2007 (T7  in plan supplied) - Reduce to the last previous points of reduction
Lime, T11 of LBI TPO (NO.333) 2007 (T8  in plan supplied) - Reduce to the last previous points of reduction
Cherry T9 of LBI TPO (NO.333) 2007 (T9  in plan supplied) - Crown thin by 10%
Cherry T8 of LBI TPO (NO.333) 2007 (T10 in plan supplied) - Crown thin by 10%
Cherry T7 of LBI TPO (NO.333) 2007 (T11 in plan supplied) - Crown thin by 10%, Crown reduce by up to 15%
